LanguageData.MSGPSBeaconMeds.label: GPS Beacon (Medical)
LanguageData.MSGPSBeaconMeds.description: A GPS beacon for medical supplies. A one time use component, that sends a radio burst signal to request supplies to a specific location.
LanguageData.MSMedSupplyFlare.label: Medical Supply Flare
LanguageData.MSMedSupplyFlare.description: Single use launcher that applies marker gas to call in medical supplies.
LanguageData.MSMedSupplyFlare.verbs.0.label: Medical supply marker flare
LanguageData.Grenade_MSMedSupplyFlare.label: Medical supply flare marker
LanguageData.Gas_MSFlareMark.label: Medical Supply Marker Gas
